cocktails.name: King's Peak
cocktails.instructions: Whip, shake, strain over popcorn ice in high west camping mug. Garnish with marigolds, grated nutmeg, and a rosemary sprig.
cocktails.garnish: Marigolds, grated nutmeg, and rosemary sprig

cocktails.name: Say Goodnight
cocktails.instructions: Torch a rosemary sprig and close in upside down cocktail glass. Add ingredients to mixing glass with cubed ice and stir. Strain into smoked glass. Serve with cubed ice. Garnish with torched rosemary spring and expressed orange twist.
cocktails.garnish: Torched rosemary spring and expressed orange twist

cocktails.name: Jolene
cocktails.instructions: Dry shake ingredients. Then add ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into small mason jar. Finish with hibiscus and absinthe drops.

cocktails.name: Little Blossom
cocktails.instructions: Combine in glass of your choice and enjoy. Shake with cubed ice. Double strain into small mason jar. Top with hazy i.p.a. Garnish with lychee candy on a clothespin.

cocktails.name: Old Black Kettle
cocktails.instructions: Shake and double strain into chilled coupe.

cocktails.name: Early Morning Breeze
cocktails.instructions: Shake and double strain into chilled wine glass with cubed ice. Top with half soda water and half prosecco. Garnish with a shiso leaf

cocktails.name: The Seeker
cocktails.instructions: Shake and strain into absinthe rinsed cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Sweet Agony
cocktails.instructions:
Shake and strain into colins glass with cubed ice. Top with soda. Thai basil sprig garnish. Agony syrup
8 mint leaves
8 basil leaves
1 cup demerara sugar
1 cup hot water
combine sugar and hot water to make simple syrup. Steep mint and basil for 24 hours. Strain and refrigerate for cocktails up to 1 month. Makes enough for roughly 10 cocktails.

cocktails.name: Time Flies
cocktails.instructions: Short shake and strain over popcorn ice. Swizzle into collins glass. Garnish with edible orchid flower.

ingredients.name: Vanilla Syrup
ingredients.description: 1part sugar, 1 part water, 3 vanilla beans steeped for 24 hours

cocktails.name: Faro Fizz
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except soda water to a cocktail shaker with ice and vigorously shake until chilled. Strain back into the cocktail shaker, discard the ice, and shake again (reverse dry shake). Double strain into a chilled collins glass. Top with soda water until soda reaches the brim of the glass. Let drink sit for 2 minutes and top with more soda water to create a foam head. Garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Giddy Up Jupiter
cocktails.instructions: Muddle mint and pineapple in a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients except sparkling wine to shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled martini glass and top with sparkling wine, garnish with a long lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Pearl De Vere
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except rose into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled champagne glass and top with bouvet rose. Garnish with an orchid flower.

cocktails.name: Allston
cocktails.instructions: Chill an old fashioned glass. Add all ingredients except soda water to a cocktail shaker and shake with cube ice until chilled. Strain back in to the cocktail shaker, discard the ice and shake again (dry reverse shake). Double strain into the chilled old fashioned glass and top with chilled soda water. Garnish with 4 drops of peychaud's bitters.

cocktails.name: Arrastra
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with cube ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into an old fashioned glass with cube ice and garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Doxology
cocktails.instructions: Muddle cucumber and sage in a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients except soda water to the shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass and top with soda water. Garnish with a sage leaf.

cocktails.name: High Noon
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into an old fashioned glass with cube ice and garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Mustang Shandy
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except tank 7 to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled champagne flute and top with boulevard tank 7. Garnish with lemon zest and grains of paradise.
cocktails.garnish: Lemon zest and grains of paradise

cocktails.name: Riata
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except lemon soda to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into an old fashioned glass over cube ice and top with fever tree sparkling lemon soda. Garnish with a lemon peel and chamomile flowers.

cocktails.name: Fool's Gold
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with lavender buds.

cocktails.name: Lauraceae Handshake
cocktails.instructions: Muddle avocado in a shaker. Add all ingredients to the shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over cubed ice and garnish with fresh pineapple and brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Madame Pattrini
cocktails.instructions: Heat a goblet with hot water, and add chamomile teabag to goblet once heated. Add all ingredients to glass and top with boiling water. Steep teabag to taste.

cocktails.name: Six Shooter
cocktails.instructions:
Chartreuse and absinthe whipped cream (hand shaken)
brandied cherries garnish
heat a goblet glass with hot water. Discard hot water and add all ingredients except whipped cream. Hand shake whipped cream (see preparation below) and pour over the top on the cocktail. Garnish with 2 brandied cherries. High west whipped cream:
3 oz whipping cream
0.25 oz green chartreuse
bar spoon st. george absinthe
0.25 oz simple syrup
add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker with no ice. Shake vigorously.

cocktails.name: Shorty Scout's Refresher
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except soda water to cocktail shaker with cube ice and shake until chilled. Strain back into the cocktail shaker and shake again with no ice (reverse dry shake). Double strain into miniature milk bottle, and top with chilled soda.

cocktails.name: Astor Hotel Special
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except soda water to cocktail shaker with cube ice and shake until chilled. Strain back into the cocktail shaker and shake again with no ice (reverse dry shake). Double strain into chilled old fashioned glass, top with chilled soda, and garnish with a lemon peel.

cocktails.name: St. Serra's Fizz
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except club soda into a cocktail shaker with cube ice and shake until chilled. Strain back into the cocktail shaker and shake again with no ice (reverse dry shake). Double strain into a chilled old fashioned glass. Top with chilled club soda and garnish with a fig.
cocktails.garnish: Chilled club soda and garnish with fig

cocktails.name: Northwest Passage
cocktails.instructions: Fill a goblet with hot water to warm the glass. Discard hot water, muddle 2 lemon slices in heated goblet, add the rest of the ingredients, stir in the glass, and garnish with cinnamon stick.

cocktails.name: Gold & Glory
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with cube ice and stir until chilled. Strain with a julep strainer into an old fashioned glass with cube ice. Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: You're A Daisy If You Do
cocktails.instructions: Chill an old fashioned glass. Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Discard the ice from the old fashioned glass, and strain with a julep strainer into the chilled old fashioned glass. Garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Le Bouvier
cocktails.instructions: Chill a cocktail glass. Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with cube ice and stir until chilled. Discard the ice from the cocktail glass and strain with a julep strainer into the chilled glass. Garnish with an orange twist wrapped around branded cherries.
cocktails.garnish: Orange twist wrapped around branded cherries

cocktails.name: High Noon Punch
cocktails.instructions: Absinthe rinse a champagne glass. Add all ingredients except rose and soda water into a cocktail shaker and shake with cube ice until chilled. Discard absinthe from the champagne glass, double strain into the champagne glass, top with rose and soda water. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Victory Lane
cocktails.instructions: Chill a martini glass. Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with cube ice and shake until chilled. Discard ice from martini glass and double strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with dehydrated orange slice.

cocktails.name: Grand Duel
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with cube ice and stir until chilled. Strain with a julep strainer into an old fashioned glass over cube ice. Garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Rusty Miner
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to an old fashioned glass with cube ice. Stir in the glass until chilled. Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Angel Of Tombstone
cocktails.instructions: Combine ingredients in mixing glass with cube ice and stir until chilled. Strain into cocktail glass over cube ice and garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Crossing Of The Fathers
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with cube ice and shake until chilled. Double strain and serve over rocks in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with candied ginger.

cocktails.name: Rickhouse
cocktails.instructions: Chill an old fashioned glass. Add all ingredients except ballast point barrel aged victory at sea into a cocktail shaker and shake with cube ice. Discard ice from old fashioned glass, double strain into the chilled old fashioned glass, top with victory at sea.

cocktails.name: Spaghetti Western
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass, stir with cube ice until chilled. Strain with a julep strainer into an old fashioned glass over cube ice. Zest an orange over the top and garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Mrs. Winslow's Elixir
cocktails.instructions: Fill a goblet with hot water to warm the glass, and discard the hot water when glass is warm. Add all the ingredients and stir until butter has dissolved. Garnish with 3 cloves.

cocktails.name: Marooned Miner
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into an old fashioned glass over cube ice. Garnish with an orange twist.

Brulee a rosemary sprig, and place an old fashioned glass over the top. Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into the smoked old fashioned glass with cube ice and garnish with the brulee rosemary sprig.

cocktails.name: Smuggler's Awaken
cocktails.instructions: Chill a martini glass. Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into the chilled martini glass. Garnish with cinnamon powder and coffee beans.

cocktails.name: Peacemaker
cocktails.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into an old fashioned glass over cube ice. Garnish with an orange wheel.

cocktails.name: Gunsmoke
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into an old fashioned glass with cube ice. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.

cocktails.name: Molly B'damn
cocktails.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into an old fashioned glass over cube ice. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

cocktails.name: Koji Collins
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except soda water to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a collins glass with ice and top with soda water. Garnish with a pinch of chinese 5 spice and a mint sprig.
cocktails.garnish: Pinch of chinese 5 spice and mint sprig

cocktails.name: Dr. Ham's Aromatic Invigorator
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except the red rock drioma into a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled goblet, top with red rock drioma.

cocktails.name: Sam Hill Sipper
cocktails.instructions:
Pineapple wedge
add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a pineapple wedge.

cocktails.name: El Vaquero
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a collins glass with crushed ice. Garnish with pineapple fronds.

cocktails.name: Ace High
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except g'night to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled old fashioned glass and top with g'night. Garnish with an orange twist and star anise.

cocktails.name: Hootspa Special
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain back into cocktail shaker, discard ice, and shake again (reverse dry shake). Double strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with micro planed nutmeg.

cocktails.name: Rose Of Cimarron
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except kombucha into a cocktail shaker and shake with cube ice until chilled. Double strain into an old fashioned glass over cube ice. Top with kombucha and garnish with a rosemary sprig.
cocktails.garnish: Kombucha and garnish with rosemary sprig

cocktails.name: Bye, Little Joe
cocktails.instructions: Absinthe rinse an old fashioned glass. Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain in an old fashioned glass over cube ice.

cocktails.name: Magnificent Seven
cocktails.instructions: Muddle cilantro in a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients except pineapple sculpin to the shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled old fashioned glass and top with ballast point pineapple sculpin. Garnish with cilantro.

cocktails.name: Deadwood Blonde
cocktails.instructions: Chill a cocktail glass. Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into the chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Loira
cocktails.instructions: Muddle blackberries in a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients to shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a glass filled with crushed ice and garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Alpine Dusty Maiden
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into an old fashioned glass over cube ice. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Wicked Felina
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except modelo negra to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled old fashioned glass and top with modelo negra. Garnish with a dried chipotle chili.

ingredients.name: High West Barrel Aged Maple Syrup

cocktails.name: Mr. Ellsworth
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into an dead man's boots glass with cube ice and garnish with 3 pineapple fronds.

cocktails.name: Mexican Standoff
cocktails.instructions: Chill an old fashioned glass. Add all ingredients except fresh squeezed ipa to a cocktail shaker and shake with cube ice until chilled. Discard ice from the old fashioned glass. Double strain into the chilled old fashioned glass. Top with fresh squeezed ipa and garnish with hibiscus dust.
cocktails.garnish: Fresh squeezed ipa and garnish with hibiscus dust

cocktails.name: Silent Stranger
cocktails.instructions: Muddle cucumber and watermelon in a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients to the cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with a cucumber slice.

ingredients.name: High West Barrel Aged Maple Syrup

cocktails.name: Camp Floyd Rickey
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except 151 rum and soda water to a collins glass with ice and stir until chilled. Top off the glass with soda water. Place the hollowed out lime on top, fill with 151 rum, and light the lime on fire.

cocktails.name: Tombstone Punch
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into an old fashioned glass with cube ice and garnish with blackberries.

cocktails.name: Say When
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into an old fashioned glass with cube ice and garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Bulette
cocktails.instructions: Muddle 3 basil leaves in a cocktail shaker. Add all ingredients to the cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a basil leaf.

cocktails.name: Robber's Roost Reviver
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except rum and angostura bitters to a collins glass with crushed ice and swizzle. Pour rum and angostura bitters over the top of the finished cocktail and garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: 3:10 To Yuzu
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into an old fashioned glass with cube ice and garnish with star anise.

cocktails.name: Remember The Alamo
cocktails.instructions:
Yield:  gallon (enough for 25 cocktails)
step 1: the hot chocolate base
1 gallon milk
2 split vanilla beans
4 blocks abuelita chocolate
3 tablespoons cinnamon
3 tablespoons nutmeg
2 tablespoons cayenne pepper (season to taste)
combine ingredients in a saucepan. Cook over medium heat until chocolate has melted and the mix is integrated. Step 2: the cocktail
1.5 oz double rye
0.5 oz coffee liqueur
6 oz hot chocolate base
whipped cream and cinnamon garnish
combine double rye, coffee liqueur, and hot chocolate base in a mug and stir. Top with whipped cream and cinnamon sprinkle.

cocktails.name: Second Coming
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over cubed ice and garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Tanglefoot
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Night Hawk
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over cube ice and garnish with a grapefruit twist.

cocktails.name: Rollin' Ridge
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain into a collins glass over ice and top with tonic water. Garnish with 2 lime wheels.

cocktails.name: Zalzala
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with star anise.

cocktails.name: The Bandit Joaquin
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain into a collins glass over ice and top with soda water. Garnish with a mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Red River Phantom
cocktails.instructions: Rinse a cocktail glass with absinthe. Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain into the cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist wrapped around brandied cherries.
cocktails.garnish: Lemon twist wrapped around brandied cherries

cocktails.name: Little Hollywood
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with fresh tarragon.

cocktails.name: Boomtown
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients with ice to a cocktail shaker and shake until chilled. Double strain over 1x1" cubes in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Arbuckle's
cocktails.instructions: Heat up a goblet glass with hot water. Discard hot water and add all ingredients and except whipping cream and stir. Pour cream on top of the cocktail. Garnish with grated chocolate.

cocktails.name: Mordecai
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with cubed ice and shake until chilled. Strain back into the cocktail shaker and shake again with no ice (reverse dry shake). Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a mint leaf.

cocktails.name: Pony Bob
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except whipping cream and simple syrup into a mason jar add ice to chill. In a separate shaker, shake heavy whipping cream with simple syrup and float on top. Place a mason jar lid on the cocktail. Garnish with high west chocolate.

cocktails.name: Division Three
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except soda water to a shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a collins glass over ice and top with soda water. Garnish with pear slices.

cocktails.name: The Miner's Experiment
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into an old fashioned glass over ice. Garnish with a flamed orange twist.

cocktails.name: Proud Mary
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except soda water and rose to a shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Double strain into a wine glass over ice and top with soda water and rose. Garnish with a grapefruit twist.

cocktails.name: Cackleberry
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain into a chilled mason jar glass. Garnish with microplaned pistachios.

cocktails.name: The Blind Miner
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain over cubed ice. Garnish with fresh cucumber wheel.

cocktails.name: The 90 Percent
cocktails.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir until chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over ice. Garnish with jasmine pearls float and a lemon twist.
cocktails.garnish: Jasmine pearls float and lemon twist

cocktails.name: Hateful Eight
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into a wine glass over cubed ice. Top with lindemans peche lambic and garnish with black salt.
cocktails.garnish: Lindemans peche lambic and garnish with black salt

cocktails.name: Ghost Dance
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with cubed ice and stir until chilled. Strain in an old fashioned glass over cubed ice. Express orange peel over drink and discard. Garnish with a fresh raspberry.

ingredients.name: Fresh Raspberry Infused High West Bourbon Tincture

cocktails.name: Emmaline
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into a coupe glass and garnish with luxardo cherries.

cocktails.name: Dreamcatcher
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Pour into a collins glass filled with crushed ice and top with fever tree sparkling lemon. Garnish with coconut salt.

cocktails.name: Pony Bob No. 2
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a mason jar over crushed ice and place lid on mason jar. Shake to chill. Garnish with ritual chocolate pieces.

cocktails.name: Medicine Man
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into a small mason jar glass over three cubes of ice. Garnish with mochi on mason jar lid.

cocktails.name: Here's How
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Pour into an old fashioned glass with cubed ice and garnish with a pineapple slice.

cocktails.name: Trapper
cocktails.instructions:
House made hot chocolate
heavy whipping cream
barspoon of demerara
simple abuelita chocolate
add all ingredients except cream and hot chocolate into a heated goblet, add hot chocolate and finish with fresh whipped cream and grate chocolate over the top.

cocktails.name: Pagoda
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a heated goblet, top off with boiling hot water.

cocktails.name: Educated Thirst
cocktails.instructions:
Lemon wheel
add all ingredients into a heated goblet, top off with boiling hot water. Garnish with a lemon wheel.

cocktails.name: Powwow
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass, stir until chilled, strain into an old fashioned glass filled with 1x1 ice. Garnish with an orange and lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Ace In The Hole
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into an old fashioned glass, add 1x1 ice, stir until chilled. Garnish with an grapefruit twist.

cocktails.name: The Waco Kid
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass, add 1x1 ice, stir until chilled, strain into a chilled small mason jar (no ice). Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Blue Blood
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass, stir until chilled, strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with an orange and lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Parley's Pick Up
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Manifest Destiny
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake until chilled. Double strain into a wine glass filled with pebble ice. Microplane nutmeg and orchid garnish.

cocktails.name: Bangtail
cocktails.instructions: Mix in the glass of your choice and enjoy.

cocktails.name: Little Big Man
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker, shake until chilled. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass.

cocktails.name: Peyote Road
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except sippin pretty into a cocktail shaker, shake until chilled, double strain into wine glass with 4 1x1 ice cubes. Top with sippin pretty.

cocktails.name: Cross Draw
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except blood orange soda into a cocktail shaker, shake until chilled, double strain into a dead mans boots glass filled with pebble ice. Top with blood orange soda. Garnish with a blood orange wheel.

cocktails.name: Two Bits
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a cocktail shaker. Double strain into a chilled coupe glass. Garnish with a thyme sprig.

cocktails.name: Tall Stranger
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except soda water into a cocktail shaker. Double strain into a collins glass with pebble ice and top with soda water. Garnish with a star anise.

cocktails.name: Lucin Cutoff
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice, stir until chilled, strain over 1x1 ice in an old fashioned glass. Garnish with an orange zest.

cocktails.name: Timbimboo
cocktails.instructions: Chill an old fashioned glass with ice. Meanwhile, add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, then stir until chilled. Discard the ice in your old fashioned glass, rinse the glass with absinthe, then strain in the cocktail with no ice. Express a lemon twist over the drink to garnish.
cocktails.garnish: Lemon twist over drink to garnish

cocktails.name: Thousand Mile Walk
cocktails.instructions: Build in an old fashioned glass, add ice, stir until chilled thoroughly. Squeeze fresh lime coin in drink to garnish.

cocktails.name: Set-up
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker tin with ice, shake, double strain into mason jar filled with pebble ice. Top with topo chico lime, garnish with a bright red maraschino cherry.

cocktails.name: Devil's Addition
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker tin, shake with pebble ice, short shake, double strain into collins glass filled with pebble ice, top with soda. Garnish with a pineapple frond.

cocktails.name: High Line
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker tin, shake with pebble ice, dirty dump into collins glass. Garnish with an edible orchid.

cocktails.name: Last Frost
cocktails.instructions: Blend to combine. Cherries to garnish.

cocktails.name: Kid Curry
cocktails.instructions: Muddle watermelon in shaker tin, add remaining ingredients. Shake with ice then double strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with a fresh curry leaf.

cocktails.name: Off The Wagon
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients, but sour ale, into a shaker tin with ice. Shake, double strain into chilled old fashioned glass, top with sour ale, garnish with a pineapple wedge.

cocktails.name: Madam Urban
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice, stir until chilled, strain over 1x1 ice in 8 oz mason jar, garnish with ritual chocolate.
